A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No spoilers in this review. This movie is not bad but it is disappointing. The good: The special effects are done very well\, with beautiful backdrops. The path of this movie was a surprise. The bad: More often than not the attempt at humor is cheesy. The script builds up hype in plot lines that are then completely disappointing when revealed. There are major holes in the story that makes even this sci fi genre unbelievable. All in all I really wanted to like this movie but it came up short. Instead of getting swept away in the story I found myself trying to make sense of it. I don't know why they went the way they did with the story but as a fan I am discouraged.
